tool_description: API to generate real-time exchange rates for 169 currencies used around the world. It takes a URL parameter of currency code and returns it current exchange rate
name: Exchange Rates API
title: Exchange Rates API

api_list.name: exchange_rates
api_list.description: Return all exchange rates in json format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rates-api1.p.rapidapi.com/exchange_rates/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rates-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /exchange_rate/currency_code
api_list.description: Returns the real-time exchange rate of the currency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rates-api1.p.rapidapi.com/exchange_rate/USD"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rates-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rates-api1.p.rapidapi.com/exchange_rate/{currency_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rates-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
